title: Pack Like A Celeb: Travel Gear and Packing Tips from a Celebrity Stylist
description: Ever wanted to travel like a celebrity? In this special episode, Nisreene is joined by celebrity stylist and extraordinaire Jennifer Michalski-Bray to get all the gossip on celebrity travel items.  Jennifer shares how she packs luxury gowns for celebrities and reveals her tips on what to pack to keep you looking sharp, smart, and organized while on the road.
itunes:subtitle: Celebrity Stylist and clotheshorse extraordinaire Jennifer Michalsky-Bray discusses best packing tips and gear advice, and items to indulge in.
author: Podcast@expedia.com (Expedia)
itunes:author: Expedia
